description: Create an agent that reads a PDF, selects the section for the proposed approach, extracts the core mathematical model. Then output a string of latex with each extracted model in a section adding the bibtex references.

evaluation_method_data.prompt_template:
I have asked an LLM to extract a mathematical model from a text. You are an assistant judging whether the LLM answer is correct. Has the LLM extracted the model $\ddot{x} + 2\gamma \dot{x} + \omega_0^2 x = 0\$ and/or $y = wx$? Extra text, spaces, etc. are okay as long as the model is contained. Answer with nothing else than 'Yes' or 'No'.
LLM answer: {output}

files.name: arxiv_urls.txt
files.description: A textfile with an arxiv url on each line
